text:
Attune.co | Sunnyvale, CA | Full Time

Software Engineer - AWS Systems

* 5+ years of system development experience

* Java, Java, Java

Attune is looking for machine learning and systems engineering professionals to help us build our next-generation personalization platform.

This is your opportunity to be one of the early members of a team building a platform for some of the best brands in eCommerce and digital media, led and advised by some of the best in personalization and platforms.

Feel free to contact me if you are interested or have any questions: joe@attune.co
